text:
Evaluate for theta between 0 and 2pi

\begin{array}{l}\n\sin \theta=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} \\\n\text { Where, } 0 \leq \theta \leq 2 \pi \\\n0 \leq \theta \leq 360\n\end{array}[imath]\sin \theta=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} [/imath] [imath]\text { Where, } 0 \leq \theta \leq 2 \pi [/imath] [imath]0 \leq \theta \leq 360[/imath]
